com.example.firstdesign.model

Class ModelFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.firstdesign.model.ModelFacade

  • public class ModelFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    SINGLETON class that has to: Provide an access point for the view. Initially, it will just have a copy of all the public methods of ShopKeeper, ThemeHandler and Game. EXAMPLE: public static boolean isThemePurchased(Themes theme) { return ShopKeeper.getInstance().isThemePurchased(theme); }

      • getInstance

        public static ModelFacade getInstance()
        Factory Method for Singleton object.
        Returns:
        Returns the single instance of ModelFacade that there should be. Ideally, it should initialize INSTANCE if it's not initialized, and then return it.
